    • Method Detail

      • search

        public ComboFlight[] search(java.lang.String source,
                            java.lang.String destination,
                            Flight[] spiceJet,
                            Flight[] silkAir,
                            int noOfPassenger,
                            org.joda.time.DateTime d,
                            java.lang.String[][] record)
        This function iterates over Spicejet and SilkAir flights to find ComboFlights that will travel from source to destination at given DateTime d with passengers noOfPassenger satisfying required transit time limits.
        Parameters:
        source - City from where the passenger will board a flight.
        destination - City where the passenger will disembark.
        spiceJet - Flight array of Spicejet.
        silkAir - Flight array of SilkAir.
        noOfPassenger - Number of passenger to travel.
        d - DateTime of travel.
        record - String[][] array of passenger seat record.
        Returns:
        ComboFlight array of routes that validate given conditions.

      • validateFlight

        public boolean validateFlight(Flight flight,
                              org.joda.time.DateTime d)
        Validates a flight based on effective period, frequency of journey and exclusive dates.
        Parameters:
        flight - Flight object containing data about a flight.
        d - DateTime of travel.
        Returns:
        true if valid else false.

      • timeDef

        public int timeDef(java.lang.String t1,
                   java.lang.String t2)
        Calculates time difference fetched in HHmm format.
        Parameters:
        t1 - Time1 in HHmm format
        t2 - Time2 in HHmm format
        Returns:
        Minutes between two given time.

      • getFlightArrival

        public org.joda.time.DateTime getFlightArrival(org.joda.time.DateTime flightDate,
                                               Flight flight)
        Parameters:
        flightDate - DateTime of flight
        flight - Flight whose date needs to be calculated.
        Returns:
        DateTime with time addition.
